ygData.subject: Neo Beast Wars

::Striker/Ramulus/Kluster::

Striker jumps over a hill, his wolf beastmode easily running through the 
savanas of Africa. He looks around. It was open fields for miles around, 
almost nothing other than grass growing there.

Striker smiles. A siege on a ship in this terrain would be suicidal for the 
attackers. There were no obstacles to hide behind, nothing to use to their 
advantage.

He looks forward, seeing the Maximal battle cruser ahead of him. Nearing it, 
he transforms into robot mode, aproaching the ship.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Kluster looks at the scanners as the beep, announcing a bot aproaching. He 
hesitates before checking its faction, but is relieved to find that it is 
Maximal. He smiles. Finally they have made contact with the bots that they 
were sent to help. He stands up.

"I'll go check it out," he says to the remainder of his crew and walks out of 
the door.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Striker looks at the bot coming out of the opening hatch of the ship. 
Glancing down at his scanners, he is relieved to find that the bot is Maximal.

"I must say you chose a great spot to crash in," he says to the bot 
aproaching him, "Attacks on this place would be suicidal."

Kluster grins. "Thanks. My name's Kluster. I'm the commander on this ship." 
He stretches out a hand.

Striker nods. "I'm Striker. One of the Maximals here." He stretches out his 
own hand, the two Maximals shaking hands.

They both turn their heads at the sound of hooves, seeing Ramulus running up.

"Ramulus, this is Kluster," Striker says, "Kluster, this is Ramulus."

Ramulus and Kluster nod. Kluster looks at the two Maximals in front of him.

"So, how's the war going?"

Striker sighs. "Not too well, actually," he admits, "A predacon attack has 
recently nearly destroyed our base."

The smile disapears from Kluster's face. "Any casualties?"

Striker nods. "Two."

Kluster nods. "Well, down to buisness." he says, "The Maximal elders sent me 
here to help you guys out. They gave me equipment, this ship, and a crew. The 
ship can support up to 140 Maximals, and can fight back quite a few preds, 
too! If your base is crap, you can move in here."

Striker blinks in surprise. "M-m-m-m," he stampers out in surprise, "Wow. 
That's a lifesaver."

Kluster grins. "I'll tell the rest of the crew we'll be having guests." His 
face darkens, "What's left of them at least."

Striker nods, "I'll come with you. Ramulus, go get the others ready. We're 
moving in."

Ramulus nods, rather reluctantly turning around and heading back toward the 
Ark. He stops, blinking. He had forgotten all about Longhunter! Ramulus looks 
around, looking to see if she was anywhere around.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Striker follows Kluster into his ship, looking around at the impressive 
defences. When they reach the bridge, Kluster looks at his crew. "Everyone, 
this is Striker, here's a Maximal on this planet," he says, "The Maximals 
have been having some tough times lately, and are in need of a base. The ship 
can support up to 140 bots, so we'll be having company soon."
